Online Biometric Spectrum Analyzer
The first Physics and Biometric Network for Security Systems based on Remote Health Diagnostics through Photoplethysmograph Spectrum Analysis with state-of-the-art PPG technologies and optical components on motion picture. The technology utilizes bio-sensors to analyze a person's skin for heart rate and cardiovascular assessments.

It is based on a broad spectrum for analyzing health mathematical equations from photoplethysmography and sound. Once the metrics are calculated they are then channeled through a Neural Network for Diagnostics and Vitals mathematical equation recognition.

Hemodynamic Mathematical Equations and Algorithms explaining the physics aspect for flow of blood in the blood vessels.
Cardiology Mathematical Equations and Algorithms that measure what causes disorders of the heart and the cardiovascular system.
Renal Mathematical Equations and Algorithms that assist in the maintaining of data into kidney diseases and failure.

Electrocardiography Mathematical Equations and Algorithms to process the production of an electrocardiogram.
Maternal and Pediatric Mathematical equations and analysis into the health of mothers, infants and children.

Gamma Sterilization Mathematical Equations and signal processing for radioactive and gamma Spectrum Analysis. (Nuclear Physics) ( Chemotherapy) (Solar)
Over 200 + Health Diagnostic Capabilities.

About

Introducing the first Biometric Neural Network in Remote Diagnostics with Thermal Resistance capabilities. Created to reduce Electromagnetic Fields in electronic microprocessors and electronic fuses utilizing SkyNets Biometric Sweep and Spectrum Analysis. Skynet plans on completing production projects for Microsoft, Android, Apple and Web Applications.

Created with Security in mind. Skynet is great for administrative networks near nuclear plants or very hot demographic locations. It uses Plasmonics and Cryptology combined to create an Electronic Neutralization effect which can drop harmful temperatures while enumerating health or vital equations. With the internet era at its peak, we humans on earth may be causing Global Warming. Skynet Biometrics IDS and VPN are a set of applications that resolve the problem immediately.

Skynet offers Enterprise software solutions by Apple Development and their products have been tested and proven to work well with Skynet Cryptology scripts as an extra enhancement for neutralizing electronics through metallics, signal processing and hardware.

SkyNet Enterprise Solutions allow custom device programming for employees or network solutions that can neutralize tempretures in data centers and server rooms.

Preformatted

i = 0;

while (!deck.isInOrder()) {
    print 'Iteration ' + i;
    deck.shuffle();
    i++;
}

print 'It took ' + i + ' iterations to sort the deck.';
